title: endu ninna
sahitya:
endu ninna pUje mADi meccisuveno


anupallavi

  cintAyadane ninna nAma enagondu kOTi


caraNam 1    pavitrOdagati pAda toLavenendendare pAvaneyAda gange pAdOdbhave 
nava kusuma samarpisuvenendare udubhavisihanu aja ninna pokkuLa pUvinali
    caraNam 2    dIpavanu beLaguvene ninna kangaLu sapta-dvIpagaLellavanu beLagutihavO
ApOshanavanAdarIvenendembene ApOshanavAitu Elu ambudhiya
    caraNam 3    kANikeyettAdaru kaimugivenendare rANivAsavu siridEvi ninage 
mANade manadoLu ninna nAma smaraNe dhyAnavanu daye mADO purandara viTTala
